General.Name: Entergy New Orleans LLC Pref
General.Description: Entergy New Orleans, LLC provides electric and gas services. As of December 31, 2017, the company distributed and transported natural gas for distribution within New Orleans, Louisiana through approximately 2,500 miles of gas pipeline. It provides electricity to approximately 200,000 customers and natural gas to 106,000 customers. The company was formerly known as Entergy New Orleans Power, LLC and changed its name to Entergy New Orleans, LLC in December 2017. The company is based in New Orleans, Louisiana. Entergy Utility Group, Inc. is a subsidiary of Entergy Corporation.
